senses: [{"definition":"In an absolute or unconditional manner; utterly, positively, wholly.","example":null},{"definition":"Independently; viewed without relation to other things or factors.","example":null},{"definition":"(grammar) In a manner that does not take an object.","example":null},{"definition":"Yes; certainly; expression indicating strong agreement.","example":"Do you want a free cookie with that coffee?\nAbsolutely!"}]
